response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to both parties. This exceptional item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I understand its importance to your endeavors. My proposal is to offer it to you for $1,200,000, aiming to create a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations, and we can proceed to finalize the details. I am confident that this product will significantly contribute to your success and growth.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
